exploreUrl:
<js>
discover = [];
push = (title, url, style) => discover.push({ title: title, url: url, style: { layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: style } });
addSlots = (count, style) => {
    remainder = count % 3;
    slotsAdd = remainder === 0 ? 0 : 3 - remainder;
    for (i = 0; i < slotsAdd; i++) {
        push("", null, style);
    }
};
push("收藏夹", null, 1);
try {
    favored = java.ajax(`${baseUrl}/api/user/favored`);
    if (favored.includes("Token不合法或者过期")) {
        push("账号未登录", null, 0.25);
        addSlots(1, 0.25);
    } else {
        favoredData = JSON.parse(favored).favoredWeb;
        favoredData.forEach(item => {
            push(item.title, `/api/user/favored-web/${item.id}?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=30&sort=update`, 0.25);
        });
        addSlots(favoredData.length, 0.25);
    }
} catch (e) {
    push("未知错误", null, 0.25);
    addSlots(1, 0.25);
};
push("来源", null, 1);
providers = ["全部", "kakuyomu", "syosetu", "novelup", "hameln", "pixiv", "alphapolis"];
providers.forEach(provider => {
    url = provider === "全部" ? 
        `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=${providers.slice(1).join('%2C')}&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=0` : 
        `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=${provider}&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=0`;
    push(provider, url, 0.25);
});
addSlots(providers.length, 0.25);
push("类型", null, 1);
types = ["全部", "连载中", "已完结", "短篇"];
types.forEach((type, index) => {
    url = `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=kakuyomu%2Csyosetu%2Cnovelup%2Chameln%2Cpixiv%2Calphapolis&type=${index}&level=0&translate=0&sort=0`;
    push(type, url, 0.25);
});
addSlots(types.length, 0.25);
push("排序", null, 1);
sorts = ["更新", "点击"];
sorts.forEach((sort, index) => {
    url = `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=kakuyomu%2Csyosetu%2Cnovelup%2Chameln%2Cpixiv%2Calphapolis&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=${index}`;
    push(sort, url, 0.25);
});
addSlots(sorts.length, 0.25);
JSON.stringify(discover);
</js>

loginUrl:
<js>
function login() {
    username = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("账号");
    password = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("密码");
    url = `${baseUrl}/api/auth/sign-in`;
    body = JSON.stringify({
        emailOrUsername: username,
        password: password
    });
    headers = {
        "Content-Type": "application/json"
    };
    response = java.post(url, body, headers);
    responseBody = response.body();
    authorizationObject = {
        Authorization: `Bearer ${responseBody}`
    };
    header = JSON.stringify(authorizationObject);
    source.putLoginHeader(header);
}
login();
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
initUrl = book.bookUrl;
url = initUrl.includes('api/novel') ? initUrl : initUrl.replace('novel', 'api/novel');
body = initUrl.includes('api/novel') ? result : java.ajax(url);
if (body.includes('ID不合适，应当使用')) {
    match = body.match(/\/\w+\/[\w-]+/);
    url = `${book.origin}/api/novel${match}`;
    body = java.ajax(url);
}
if (body.includes("Token不合法或者过期")) {
    java.toast("当前会话已失效，请重新登录");
}
java.put('url', url);
body
</js>

ruleContent.content: value = String(book.getVariable("custom")) || String(source.getVariable()); get = (value >= '1' && value <= '9') ? value : '1'; config = { 1: 'sakuraParagraphs', 2: 'gptParagraphs', 3: 'youdaoParagraphs', 4: 'baiduParagraphs', 5: 'paragraphs' }; result = JSON.parse(result); content = result[config[get]] || result[config[2]] || result[config[3]] || result[config[4]] || result[config[5]]; if (['6', '7', '8', '9'].includes(get)) { type = ['6', '8'].includes(get); jpContent = result[config[5]]; cnContent = result[config[1]] || result[config[2]] || result[config[3]] || result[config[4]]; if (cnContent) { content = jpContent.flatMap((jp, i) => (type ? [cnContent[i], jp] : [jp, cnContent[i]])).filter(Boolean); } else { content = jpContent; } }; regex = content => { displayedImages = new Set(); return JSON.stringify(content).replace(/<图片>(https?:\/\/[^"\s]+)/g, (_, p1) => { if (displayedImages.has(p1)) return ''; displayedImages.add(p1); return ''; }); }; format = content => content.replace(/^\[|\]$/g, '').split(',').map(item => item.trim().replace(/^"|"$/g, '')).filter(Boolean).map((item, i) => item.startsWith('{"headers"') && i > 0 ? ',' + item : ' ' + item).join("\n"); format(regex(content));

searchUrl:
<js>
providers = {
    kakuyomu: /(?:https?:\/\/)?kakuyomu\.jp\/works\/(\d+)/,
    syosetu: /(?:https?:\/\/)?(ncode|novel18)\.syosetu\.com\/(\w+)/,
    novelup: /(?:https?:\/\/)?novelup\.plus\/story\/(\d+)/,
    hameln: /(?:https?:\/\/)?syosetu\.org\/novel\/(\d+)/,
    pixiv: /(?:https?:\/\/)?(www\.pixiv\.net\/novel\/series\/(\d+)|www\.pixiv\.net\/novel\/show\.php\?id=(\d+))/,
    alphapolis: /(?:https?:\/\/)?www\.alphapolis\.co\.jp\/novel\/(\d+)\/(\d+)/,
    sakura: /(?:https?:\/\/)?books\d?\.fishhawk\.top\/(?:api\/)?novel\/(\w+)\/([\w-]+)/
};
for (provider in providers) {
    match = key.match(providers[provider]);
    if (match) {
        providerId = provider === 'sakura' ? match[1] : provider;
        novelId = provider === 'alphapolis' ? `${match[1]}-${match[2]}` : provider === 'pixiv' ? (match[3] ? `s${match[3]}` : match[2]) : (match[2] || match[1]);
        url = `${baseUrl}/api/novel/${providerId}/${novelId}`;
        break;
    } else {
        url = `${baseUrl}/api/novel?page=${page-1}&pageSize=20&query=${key}&provider=kakuyomu,syosetu,novelup,hameln,pixiv,alphapolis&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=1`;
    }
    url
}
</js>
variableComment: 输入对应数字刷新即可获取对应文本，{1: "sakura译文", 2: "gpt译文", 3: "有道译文", 4: "百度译文", 5: "原文", 6: "中日", 7: "日中", 8: "5+6", 9: "5+7"}，默认sakura译文。书籍变量作用于一本书，源变量作用于整个书源，书籍变量优先级高于源变量。

    function groupQuery() {
        const url = base_url + "/group_name?cookie={{String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com'))}}";
        const res = java.ajax(url);
        const data = JSON.parse(res).data;

        data.forEach(group => {
            let key;
            for (key in group) {
                groupDatas.push({
                    "title": key,
                    "url": base_url +"/bookshelf2?page={{page}}&book_ids=" + group[key].join(","),
                    "style": {
                        "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                        "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                    }
                });
            }
        });

        if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
            groupDatas.push({
                "title": "--",
                "url": "",
                "style": {
                    "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                    "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                }
            });
        }
    }

    try {
    	java.longToast("请稍等,正在更新分组数据!");
    // 用户信息
    const userUrl = base_url + '/fquser?sessionid={{String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid"))}}';
    const userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
    const userInfo = JSON.parse(userRes).data.name;

            "title": `${userInfo}个人中心`,
            "url": "",
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
            }

    ];
    groupQuery();

function fq_last() {
	let url = `https://api5-normal-sinfonlineb.fqnovel.com/reading/bookapi/multi-detail/v/?aid=1967&iid=1&version_code=999&book_id={{$.book_id}}`;
        let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data[0]; 
        return last["last_chapter_title"]+" · "+java.timeFormat(last["last_chapter_update_time"]*1000);
	
	}

	
function qm_last() {
	let headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
	sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'

params={'id':{{$.book_id}}, 'imei_ip':'2937357107','teeny_mode':0}

var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {  
  if(param==null) return '';  
  var paramStr = '';  
  var t = typeof (param);  
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {  
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);  
  } else {  
    for (var i in param) {  
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);  
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);  
    }  
  }  
  return paramStr;  
};
paramSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key));
headerSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))
params['sign']=paramSign;
headers['sign']=headerSign;
let url = "https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/book/detail?"+urlEncode(params);
option = {'headers':headers};
let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url+','+JSON.stringify(option)))["data"]["book"];
let last2 =  `${last["latest_chapter_title"]} · ${java.timeFormat(last['update_time']*1000)} `
	return last2
	}

<js>
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'server',String(source.bookSourceComment));
let key2 = '';
try {
	key2 = String(cookie.getCookie(base_url)) || String(java.getCookie(base_url));
	key2 = getKey(key2);
        } catch (e) {key2='';}


let media;
let sources = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'source',String(source.bookSourceComment));
if (String(key).startsWith("m:")||String(key).startsWith("m：")) {
  media = "漫画"
  key = key.slice(2)
  }else if (String(key).startsWith("t:")||String(key).startsWith("t：")) {
  media = "听书"
  key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("d:")||String(key).startsWith("d：")) {
  media = "短剧"
  key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("x:")||String(key).startsWith("x："))  {
	media = "小说"
  key = key.slice(2)
	} else {
	media = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'media',String(source.bookSourceComment));
	}
if (key.includes('@')) {
  const parts = key.split('@');
  key = parts[0];
  sources = parts[1] || sources;
}
	`${base_url}/search?title=${key}&tab=${media}&source=${sources}&key=${key2}`
</js>

新增快速搜索
书籍名@来源
目前支持来源：番茄、七猫、得间、QQ、熊猫、塔读、69书吧、伪69、喜马拉雅、小米、猫眼、百度、米读、顶点、星星小说、笔趣阁22、爱下电子书、搜书神器、得奇

新增河马短剧，七猫短剧

恢复69书吧使用:www.69shuba.com
由于搜索可靠性不高，可能搜索时间较长，故不加入全部搜索，请点击69书吧搜索使用

1.采用全新验证方式，之后未填写密钥，可以在阅读页登陆后刷新阅读页面即可！
2.搜索默认改为全局搜索，目前仅支持番茄，七猫，QQ，得间，熊猫，后面的按钮是预设，后期会添加相关来源
3.新增大灰狼书架功能，在登陆里面点击书架查看
下个版本预计更新内容：
1.预计发现页新增阅读记录和大灰狼书架栏目
2.预计新增阅读记录，阅读过的书籍可在大灰狼书架-阅读历史中查看
3.预计新增塔读小说，米读小说，小米阅读，猫眼看书，部分起点

const groupDatas = [];
let infoData = [];
function deviceType() {
  try {
    return!!java.androidId();
  } catch (e) {
    return false;
  }
}
let device = deviceType()? 'android' : 'ios';
if (device == 'android' && (String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com')))) {
    function groupQuery() {
        const url = base_url + "/group_name?cookie={{String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com'))}}";
        const res = java.ajax(url);
        const data = JSON.parse(res).data;

        data.forEach(group => {
            let key;
            for (key in group) {
                groupDatas.push({
                    "title": key,
                    "url": base_url +"/bookshelf2?page={{page}}&book_ids=" + group[key].join(","),
                    "style": {
                        "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                        "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                    }
                });
            }
        });

        if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
            groupDatas.push({
                "title": "--",
                "url": "",
                "style": {
                    "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                    "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                }
            });
        }
    }

    try {
    	java.longToast("请稍等,正在更新分组数据!");
    // 用户信息
    const userUrl = base_url + '/fquser?sessionid={{String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid"))}}';
    const userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
    const userInfo = JSON.parse(userRes).data.name;

    infoData = [
        {
            "title": `${userInfo}个人中心`,
            "url": "",
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
            }
        }
    ];
    groupQuery();

let res =java.hexDecodeToString(result).split('大灰狼融合2.1');

let tab = res[1];
let title = res[2];
let sources = res[3];
let tone_id = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'tone_id',String(source.bookSourceComment));
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'server',String(source.bookSourceComment));
let key = '';
try {
	key = String(cookie.getCookie(base_url)) || String(java.getCookie(base_url));
	key = getKey(key);
 } catch (e) {key='';}
        
        
let device,device_type;
try {
    device = java.androidId();
    device_type='安卓';
} catch (e) {
    try{
device = java.deviceID();
device_type='苹果';
}catch (e) {device = '';
device_type='安卓';
}
}
let sq_user_id = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'sq_user_id',String(source.bookSourceComment)) || '0';

let content_url;
if (tab=='小说') {
	content_url= `/content?item_id=${item_id}&device=${device}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&key=${key}&sq_user_id=${sq_user_id}`;
 } 
 else if (tab=='听书') {
 	 	content_url= `/audio?item_id=${item_id}&device=${device}&tone_id=${tone_id}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&key=${key}`;
 	} else if (tab=='漫画') {
 		 	content_url=	`/pic?item_id=${item_id}&device=${device}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&key=${key}`;
 		} else if (tab=='短剧') {
 		content_url=	`/video?item_id=${item_id}&device=${device}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&key=${key}`;
 			}
 let data = java.ajax(base_url+content_url);
 try {
if (JSON.parse(data).msg) {
	java.toast(JSON.parse(data).msg);
	}}catch (e) {}
let content = JSON.parse(data).content;
if (device_type=='安卓' && tab  == '短剧'){
	data = {'content':`【右上角刷新】开启播放(下一集请切换下一章刷新)\n播放直链：\n${content}`}
	data = JSON.stringify(data);
	 if (book.durChapterIndex===chapter.index){
	 //let b64 = java.base64Encode(generateVideoPage(title,content));
	// let dataUrl = `data:text/html;base64,${b64}`;
	// 	java.startBrowser(dataUrl,title);
	 	java.startBrowser(content,title);
	 	java.toast('正在加载视频...');
	}};

data;
</js>

	let headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
	sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'

params={'id':{{$.book_id}}, 'imei_ip':'2937357107','teeny_mode':0}

var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {  
  if(param==null) return '';  
  var paramStr = '';  
  var t = typeof (param);  
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {  
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);  
  } else {  
    for (var i in param) {  
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);  
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);  
    }  
  }  
  return paramStr;  
};
paramSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key));

params['sign']=paramSign;
headers['sign']=headerSign;
let url = "https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/book/detail?"+urlEncode(params);
option = {'headers':headers};

                "url": "",
                "style": {
                    "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                    "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45

	}

	
function qm_last() {
	let headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
	sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'

params={'id':{{$.book_id}}, 'imei_ip':'2937357107','teeny_mode':0}

var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {  
  if(param==null) return '';  
  var paramStr = '';  
  var t = typeof (param);  
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {  
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);  
  } else {  
    for (var i in param) {  
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);  
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);  
    }  
  }  
  return paramStr;  
};
paramSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key));
headerSign=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))
params['sign']=paramSign;
headers['sign']=headerSign;
let url = "https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/book/detail?"+urlEncode(params);
option = {'headers':headers};
let last =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url+','+JSON.stringify(option)))["data"]["book"];
let last2 =  `${last["latest_chapter_title"]} · ${java.timeFormat(last['update_time']*1000)} `

        } catch (e) {key2='';}


let media;
let sources = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'source',String(source.bookSourceComment));
if (String(key).startsWith("m:")||String(key).startsWith("m：")) {
  media = "漫画"
  key = key.slice(2)
  }else if (String(key).startsWith("t:")||String(key).startsWith("t：")) {
  media = "听书"
  key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("d:")||String(key).startsWith("d：")) {
  media = "短剧"
  key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("x:")||String(key).startsWith("x："))  {
	media = "小说"
  key = key.slice(2)
	} else {
	media = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'media',String(source.bookSourceComment));
	}
if (key.includes('@')) {
  const parts = key.split('@');
  key = parts[0];
  sources = parts[1] || sources;
}
	`${base_url}/search?title=${key}&tab=${media}&source=${sources}&key=${key2}`
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
//重定向和导入书架处理
let i = String(book.bookUrl).includes('https:/');
if (i) {
	book.bookUrl = `data:;base64,${java.base64Encode(baseUrl.replace(/,{o.+/,''))},{'type':''}`;
	}

//告诉目录是由详情来的
java.put('sx1',1);

nn = String(source.getVariable()).replace(/\/$/,'');
if (nn=='') {
	{{source.loginUrl}}
	nn = String(source.getVariable()).replace(/\/$/,'');}

//发书评功能
let bkbl = book.getVariable("custom");
//解书籍地址
let ml = String(book.bookUrl).replace(/.+,(.+),.+/,'$1');
let mlj = java.base64Decode(ml);
let [, bkid=''] = mlj.match(/book\/(\d+)/)||[];
//↑获取书id
java.put('bkid',bkid);

if (bkbl=='🔒'||bkbl=='') {
//带🔒或书籍变量为空会经过这里
//处理加书架功能
let sj=java.get('sj');
let sj2=source.get('8xsj'); //启用同步的标识
if (sj=='2'&&sj2=='1') {java.put('sj',3);tbshujia(nn,bkid);}
else if (sj=='1') {java.put('sj',2);}

	}
else if (bkbl=='目录') {
	//清空最新章储存强制刷新目录
	java.put('8xzx','');
	//清空输入的书籍变量
	book.putCustomVariable('');}
else {
let pfurl = nn+'/modules/article/rating.php';
let plurl = nn+'/modules/article/reviews.php';
let ck = source.getLoginHeader()||'';
let cki = ck.match(/UserToken%3D([^%]+)/)||['',''];
tk = cki[1];
//↑获取链接和tk

if (bkid != '' && tk != '') {
let tm = new Date().getTime();
let bkfs = (bkbl.match(/^(\d|10)分$/) || ['','0'])[1];
let pfbody = `score=${bkfs}&id=${bkid}&ajax_request=${tm}`;
let plbody = `ptitle=&act=newpost&jieqi_token=${tk}&Submit=&pcontent=${bkbl}&aid=${bkid}&ajax_request=${tm}`;

let headers = JSON.parse(eval(source.header.replace('@js:','')+''));
headers['Referer']=mlj;

if (bkfs != 0) {url=pfurl;body=pfbody;}
else {url=plurl;body=plbody;}
//清空输入的书籍变量
book.putCustomVariable('');
//let by = java.post(url,body,headers).body();
let by = java.connect(url+','+JSON.stringify(
    	{"method": "POST",
    	header:headers,
    	body:body})
    	).body();
java.longToast("\n"+java.htmlFormat(by));
//随机延时0-1秒
let tim = Math.floor(Math.random()*1001);
Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(tim);
cache.deleteMemory('bax'+bkid);
	} else if (tk == '') {java.toast('未登录');}
}

if (!i) {
	 //尝试用缓存

ruleContent.content:
<js>
let bin = book.durChapterIndex;
let cin = chapter.index;
let inn = cin - bin;
let dn = source.get('8xdn');
let sleep = Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep;
//java.log(chapter.title+'inn：'+inn);
if ((inn==-4||inn==4)&&dn!=1) {java.longToast('\n使用下载需要在书源登录界面开启功能\n建议预下载设定不要大于3');}

nn = String(source.getVariable()).replace(/\/$/,'');
if (nn=='') {
	{{source.loginUrl}}
	nn = String(source.getVariable()).replace(/\/$/,'');}

let tim = Math.floor(Math.random()*201);
let ii = 1;
//手动限制并发,下载时(0-20秒随机)

function delayl(ll){
	sleep(tim);
	let innx;
	while (dn!=1) {
Packages.java.util.concurrent.locks.LockSupport.parkNanos(this,50*1e6); //过大时js在此中断会异常
		innx = cin - book.durChapterIndex;
//java.log(innx);//log时能较稳定重载
		if (innx==0) return;
		else if (innx==-1) {continue;}
		else {ii=0;return;}
		}
	sleep(-ll*2000);
}

switch(inn) {
	case 0: break;
	case 1: sleep(1000+tim); break;
	case 2: sleep(4500+tim); break;
	case 3: sleep(7500+tim); break;
	case -1: delayl(-1); break;
	case -2: delayl(-2); break;
	case -3: delayl(-3); break;
	default: dn==1 ? sleep(tim*100) : ii=0; break;
}

//延时结束
let bkid = java.get('bkid'); //两个putm用

if (inn==0||inn==1) {
//放入书名和id
cache.putMemory('8xid',{[bkid]: book.name});
let Info=source.getLoginInfoMap()||{};
Info['书名'] = book.name;
source.putLoginInfo(JSON.stringify(Info));
// 本地阅读进度
let sjj=source.get('sj'+bkid)+'';
if (java.get('sj')==3||sjj) {	source.put('sj'+bkid,book.author+','+book.durChapterTitle+','+book.durChapterIndex);}
}


let tt = java.hexDecodeToString(result);
tt=String(tt).replace(/https\:\/{2}[A-z\d\.]+/,nn);
//java.log('正文地址：'+tt);
let ml = String(book.tocUrl).replace(/.+,(.+),.+/,'$1');
let mlj = java.base64Decode(ml);

if (ii) {
//↓第一次访问正文
try {
		let baxtime = cache.getFromMemory('baxtime');
	 if (baxtime<Date.now()) baxtime=Date.now();
	 baxtime+=2000;
	cache.putMemory('baxtime',baxtime);
	while(Date.now()<baxtime||cache.getFromMemory('bxvip'+bkid)) {
	Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(1000);}

const startTime=new Date().getTime();
result=java.ajax(tt);
const endTime=new Date().getTime();
let speed = (endTime - startTime)/1000;
if (speed>39) java.toast('\n正文页访问延迟过长：'+speed.toFixed()+'秒');
//复原手机版链接，干掉字数统计。重新刷新时不为这个链接，不会导致二次加载
chapter.url = tt.replace('www.','');

//拦截超时报错
} catch (e) {if (/timeout/.test(e)) java.toast('正文超时'); else {inn==0&&java.toast('正文异常：'+e);}
java.log('八叉正文出错：'+e);}
// if ii 结束
	} else {result='';}
//inn>1时为空，软件会自动重新获取

let rr = java.getString('class.mt mb@a@text||class.tc mb@a@text',result);

//内容识别
if (rr.includes("登录") ) {
	java.toast("💎请重新登录书源账号");
	result='';}
else if (rr.includes("充值") ) {
let url = nn+'/modules/obook/buychapter.php';
let ck = source.getLoginHeader()+'';
let tk = (ck.match(/UserToken%3D([^%]+)/)||['',''])[1];
let cid = tt.match(/cid\=(\d+)/)[1];
let body = `buytype=1&act=buy&jieqi_token=${tk}&cid=${cid}&submit=`;
let headers = JSON.parse(eval(source.header.replace('@js:','')+''));
headers['Referer']=tt;

if (tk && nn && cid) {
	cache.putMemory('bxvip'+bkid,true);
	try {
	sleep(600-tim);
	let pt = java.connect(url+','+JSON.stringify(
    	{"method": "POST",
    	"header":headers,
    	"body":body})
    	);
  let lc = pt.url()+'';
  if (lc.includes('/read/')||lc.includes('/obook/')) {
  	java.toast("已为你自动购买");
  	result = pt.body();}
  	else if (lc.includes('buychapter')) {
  		java.toast('购买失败\n检测到未重定向');
  		result = pt.body();}
  	else java.toast('购买异常');
 	} catch (err) {java.longToast("💔VIP内容获取失败"); result='';}
 		cache.putMemory('bxvip'+bkid,false);
} else if (!tk) {java.toast("💎书源未获取到登录信息"); result='';} else java.longToast('nn或cid为空');


} else {
//无VIP登录，正常直接加载
}

result = java.getString('[id*="content"]@html',result);
//检查
result

<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
nn = String(source.getVariable()).replace(/\/$/,'');
let url = `${nn}/modules/article/search.php`;
let url2='data:;base64,QQ,{"type":"bx"}';
try {
	if (key.startsWith('书名：') ) {
		url += `?searchkey=${key.substr(3)}&searchtype=articlename&page=${page}`;
			ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
		}
		
		else if (key.startsWith('作者：') ) {
		url += `?searchkey=${key.substr(3)}&searchtype=author&page=${page}`
			ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
		}
		
		else if (key.startsWith('标签：') ) {
		url += `?searchkey=${key.substr(3)}&searchtype=keywords&page=${page}`;
			ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
		}
		
		else if (page == 1) {
		ftsm();
		let body = `searchtype=all&searchkey=${key}&act=search&submit=`;
	ss = java.post(url,body,{	'User-Agent': ua});
    	
	}
	
	else {
		url +=	`?searchkey=${key}&searchtype=all&page=${page}`;
	ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
	}

let code = ss.statusCode();
if (code==302||code==301) {
	//重定向
	url2=ss.header("location");
	let i=url2.includes(encodeURI(url).replace(/^http.{4}[^\/]+\//,''));
	if (i) {
	let durl=url2.match(/^http.{4}[^\/]+\//,'')[0];
	source.setVariable(durl);
	java.longToast('\n源地址已更新为新地址：\n'+durl);
	java.log('\n源地址已更新为新地址：\n'+durl);}
	}
else if (code == 200) {
	cache.put('8xss1', ss.body());
	}
else if (code == 520) {
	java.toast("💔IP被拉黑");
	}
else {
	java.toast("💔搜索响应码异常");
	}


} catch(err) {
	url2 =	url+`?searchkey=${key}&searchtype=all&page=${page}`;
	java.log('搜索异常：'+err+'\n备用方案：'+url2);
	cache.put('8xbl1', source.getVariable());
	source.setVariable('');
	}
url2
</js>
variableComment:
♦源变量：
　 当前书源使用的网址
　 可点击发现页版本号手动刷新

♦书籍变量：
　 ①填写  🔒 并刷新，关闭本书评论显示
　 ②填写“目录”并刷新，强制刷新目录
　 ③填写分数并刷新，使用分数进行评分
　 ④填写其它并刷新，内容作为评论发送
分数格式示意“1分”“2分”…“10分”

㊟默认详情页检测到有更新内容时才会刷新目录

！注意区分源变量和书籍变量

header:
<js>
  let defaultVariable = 
  	{
    "action": ""
  }
  let variable = source.getVariable();
  if(variable != "" && variable != null){
    try{
      variable = JSON.parse(variable);
    } catch(err) {
      java.log(err);
      variable = defaultVariable;
      source.variable = JSON.stringify(defaultVariable);
      java.toast("请按照规则修改源变量，已重置源变量！")
    }
  } else {
    variable = defaultVariable;
    source.variable = JSON.stringify(defaultVariable);
  }
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var datax = null;
var allChapters = [];
var finalJsonOutput = null;
var inputString = baseUrl;
var parts = inputString.split(',');
var url = parts[0].trim();
try {
    var xDataRegex = /x-data="[^"]*Login\(\d+,\s*'([^']+)'/;
    var match = result.match(xDataRegex);
    if (match && match[1]) {
        datax = match[1];
    } else {
        java.log("未能从源码中匹配并提取到 x-data token");
        throw new Error("XSRF token not found"); // Token 是必须的
    }
    var urlWithXsrf = url + "?_xsrf=" + encodeURIComponent(datax);
    var cookie = "85_ID=" + java.getCookie(url, "85_ID");
    var baseHeaders = {
        "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 14; 2312DRAABC) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/132.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
        "Content-Type": "application/json;charset=UTF-8",
        "Referer": url,
        "Accept": "application/json, text/plain",
        "Cookie": cookie
    };
    var slices = [];
    var selectContentRegex = /<select class="[^"]*select-primary[^"]*"[^>]*>([\s\S]*?)<\/select>/;
    var selectMatch = result.match(selectContentRegex);
    if (selectMatch && selectMatch[1]) {
        var optionsHtml = selectMatch[1];
        var sliceRegex = /(\d+)\s*~\s*(\d+)/g;
        var sliceMatch;
        while ((sliceMatch = sliceRegex.exec(optionsHtml)) !== null) {
            var start = parseInt(sliceMatch[1], 10);
            var end = parseInt(sliceMatch[2], 10);
            if (!isNaN(start) && !isNaN(end)) {
                slices.push([start, end]);
            }
        }
    }
    if (slices.length === 0) {
        java.log("未能提取到任何章节 Slice，将尝试获取默认范围 [1, 200]");
        slices = [
            [1, 200]
        ];
    }
    java.log("将要处理的 Slices: " + JSON.stringify(slices));
    for (var i = 0; i < slices.length; i++) {
        var currentSlice = slices[i];
        // java.log("准备获取 Slice: " + currentSlice.join(' ~ '));
        var maxAttempts = 3;
        var success = false;
        for (var attempt = 1; attempt <= maxAttempts; attempt++) {
            java.log("尝试获取 Slice " + currentSlice.join('~') + " (第 " + attempt + "/" + maxAttempts + " 次)");
            var jsonString = null;
            try {
                var bodyPayload = {
                    "action": "chapters",
                    "slice": currentSlice
                };
                var op = {
                    "body": JSON.stringify(bodyPayload),
                    "method": "post",
                    "headers": baseHeaders
                };
                var requestString = urlWithXsrf + "," + JSON.stringify(op);
                jsonString = java.ajax(requestString);
                if (jsonString && (jsonString.trim().startsWith('{') || jsonString.trim().startsWith('['))) {
                    var jsonObject = JSON.parse(jsonString);
                    if (jsonObject && jsonObject.result && Array.isArray(jsonObject.result.chapters)) {
                        var fetchedCount = jsonObject.result.chapters.length;
                        allChapters = allChapters.concat(jsonObject.result.chapters);
                        // java.log("成功获取 Slice " + currentSlice.join('~') + " (第 " + attempt + " 次尝试): 本次获取 " + fetchedCount + " 章, 累计 " + allChapters.length + " 章");
                        java.log("成功获取 Slice " + currentSlice.join('~') + " (第 " + attempt + " 次尝试)");
                        success = true;
                        break;
                    } else {
                        java.log("第 " + attempt + " 次尝试: Slice " + currentSlice.join('-') + " 的 JSON 响应格式不正确或未包含 chapters 数组: " + jsonString.substring(0, 200));
                    }
                } else {
                    java.log("第 " + attempt + " 次尝试: Slice " + currentSlice.join('-') + " 返回的不是有效的 JSON: " + jsonString.substring(0, 200));
                    java.log("Slice " + currentSlice.join('-') + " Raw Response (Attempt " + attempt + "): " + jsonString);
                }
            } catch (ajaxOrParseError) {
                java.log("第 " + attempt + " 次尝试获取或解析 Slice " + currentSlice.join('-') + " 时出错: " + ajaxOrParseError);
            }
            if (!success && attempt < maxAttempts) {
                var retryDelay = 4000;
                java.log("等待 " + retryDelay + "ms 后重试...");

                Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(retryDelay);
            } else if (!success && attempt === maxAttempts) {

                java.log("已达到最大尝试次数 (" + maxAttempts + ")，放弃获取 Slice 重新搜索过下cf试试" + currentSlice.join('~'));
            }
        }
        if (i < slices.length - 1) {
            java.log("等待2500ms");
            Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(2500);
        }
    }
    var combinedResult = {
        "code": 0,
        "result": {
            "code": 1,
            "chapters": allChapters
        }
    };
    finalJsonOutput = JSON.stringify(combinedResult);

} catch (e) {
    java.log("处理目录 JS 规则时发生顶层错误: " + e);
    finalJsonOutput = null;
}
result = finalJsonOutput; 
</js>

ruleContent.nextContentUrl:
<js>
var nextChapterUrl = null; 
try {    
    var doc = result;
    if (!doc) {        
        throw new Error("HTML 解析失败"); 
    }        
    var nextLink = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(doc).select("a:containsOwn(下─章)");
    if (nextLink) {        
        var onclickValue = nextLink.attr("onclick");
        if (onclickValue) {                        
            var idRegex = /location\.href='([^']+)\.idx'/;
            var idMatch = onclickValue.match(idRegex);
            if (idMatch && idMatch[1]) {
                var chapterIdPart = idMatch[1];                 
                var checkRegex = /_\d+$/; 
                if (checkRegex.test(chapterIdPart)) {                                      
                    var newFileName = chapterIdPart + ".html";                                        
                    var lastSlashRegex = /\/[^/]*$/;
                    if (typeof baseUrl === 'string') {                        
                        nextChapterUrl = baseUrl.replace(lastSlashRegex, "/" + newFileName);
                        
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
} catch (e) {    
    nextChapterUrl = null; 
}
result = nextChapterUrl;
</js>

bookSourceComment:
// Error: 发现失效

❗️一些功能
1、每隔八小时访问一遍签到（使用的时候访问）
2、点击“登录”自定义发现
3、更改过发现要刷新本书源才会生效
4、点击章节链接可以查看评论，注意要设置成内部浏览器，长按章节链接可以设置
5、设置源变量或设置书籍变量可以查看一些功能说明
❗️注意事项:
1、请不要退出晋江app的账号，只要点了退出，或者在其他地方登录了，都要重新抓token。
2、更新token，书籍就要更新目录。
3、【抓包token登录】和【账号登录】二选一，【抓包token登录】的优先级高些，填了【抓包token登录】，就是按【抓包token登录的值】登录
4、登录步骤【设备保护关闭的状态下】：
①填写好账号密码，点击“邮箱验证码”或者“手机验证码”
②填写好验证码，点击“邮箱登录”或者“手机登录”
③想要确认是否成功可以在登录UI里点右上角三点，查看登录头token里是否有值。
④如果弹出提示“请校检验证码”，可尝试填入上一次发送给你验证码。
5、如果邮箱和手机号无法登录，可能是需要过滑动验证码，可尝试先在晋江app里登录一遍后，再在阅读里登录，❗️还是不行就只能抓包token，填写在“抓包token登录”处。

function parseCategory(data) {
  const [title, url, num = defaultNumPerRow] = data.split(separator);
  
  const fullUrl = /^\d+|natural/.test(url) 
    ? `http://app-cdn.jjwxc.net/bookstore/getFullPage?channelBody=%7B%22${url}%22%3A%7B%22offset%22%3A%22{{(page-1)*25}}%22%2C%22limit%22%3A%2225%22%7D%7D&versionCode=148`
    : url;
  
  return [title, fullUrl, num];
}

  } else if (tagType === "at") {
  	fullUrl = `https://app-cdn.jjwxc.com/androidapi/authorColumn?authorid=${url}`;
  	
  	}else if (tagType === "class") {
  	fullUrl = `https://android.jjwxc.net/androidapi/incrementFavorite,{'method':'POST','body':\"versionCode=313&token=${token}&order=0&classId=${url}&backupTime=${Date.now()}\"}`
  	
  	}else if (tagType === "lx") {
    fullUrl = `https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=313&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq=0&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=${tagCategory}&sd=0&lx=${url}&fg=0&mainview=0&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token=${token}`;
  }
  return [title, fullUrl, num];
}

// 创建 FlexBox 对象
function createFlexBox(title, url, num) {
  const flexBasisMap = { 1: 1, 2: 0.4, 3: 0.25, 4: 0.2, 5: 0.15, 7: 0.1, 10: 0.05 };
  return {
    title,
    url: url || '',
    style: {
      layout_flexGrow: 1,
      layout_flexBasisPercent: flexBasisMap[num]
    }
  };
}

// 生成分类结果
const result = [];
result.push(createFlexBox(`📂 我的收藏`, "https://android.jjwxc.net/androidapi/incrementFavorite,{\"method\":\"POST\",\"body\":\"versionCode=313&token={{Map('token')}}&order=0&classId=&backupTime={{Date.now()}}\"}", 1));

if(ShelfNum){
const ShelfNumList = String(ShelfNum).split(",");
ShelfNumList.forEach(x => {
  const parsedTag = parseTag(ShelfList[x]);
  result.push(createFlexBox(parsedTag[0], parsedTag[1], parsedTag[2],parsedTag[3]));
});
}


authorNames.forEach(tag => {
  const parsedTag = parseTag(tag, tagCategory);
  result.push(createFlexBox(parsedTag[0], parsedTag[1], parsedTag[2],parsedTag[3]));
});

all.forEach(item => {
  const parsedItem = parseCategory(item);
  result.push(createFlexBox(parsedItem[0], parsedItem[1], parsedItem[2]));
});

const enabledCategoryList = enabledCategories.split(",");
enabledCategoryList.forEach(categoryIndex => {
  const categoryName = categories[categoryIndex];
  if (categoryData[categoryName]) {
    result.push(createFlexBox(`${分类标识} ${categoryName}连载`, null, 1));
    categoryData[categoryName].连载.forEach(item => {
      const parsedItem = parseCategory(item);
      result.push(createFlexBox(parsedItem[0], parsedItem[1], parsedItem[2]));
    });
    result.push(createFlexBox(`${分类标识} ${categoryName}完结`, null, 1));
    categoryData[categoryName].完结.forEach(item => {
      const parsedItem = parseCategory(item);
      result.push(createFlexBox(parsedItem[0], parsedItem[1], parsedItem[2]));
    });
    result.push(createFlexBox(`${榜单标识} ${categoryName}榜单`, null, 1));
    categoryData[categoryName].榜单.forEach(item => {
      const parsedItem = parseCategory(item);
      result.push(createFlexBox(parsedItem[0], parsedItem[1], parsedItem[2]));
    });
  }
});

result.push(createFlexBox(`${标签标识} ${tagName}标签`, null, 1));
tags.forEach(tag => {
  const parsedTag = parseTag(tag, tagCategory);
  result.push(createFlexBox(parsedTag[0], parsedTag[1], parsedTag[2],parsedTag[3]));
});

JSON.stringify(result)
</js>

[content.slice(-12), content.slice(0, -12)] : [content.slice(0, 12), content.slice(12)]; let key = java.md5Encode(v43 + v38).slice(0, 8); let iv = java.md5Encode(v38).slice(0, 8); content = java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", key, iv).decryptStr(dest); } return content } let intro = String(java.get("intro1")).replace(/\s/g, ''); const hasContent = /"content"/.test(result); java.setContent(hasContent ? result : decode()); intro = intro ? `◎${intro}◎
` : ''; let content = String(java.getString("$..content")); let saybody = (/关闭作话/.test(bbb) || /关闭作话/.test(sss))?"":java.getString("$..sayBody"); let say = /[\u4e00-\u9fa5]/.test(saybody) ? `\n【📢作者有话说】\n${saybody}` : ''; if (/token|vipContent/.test(baseUrl)) { const vipc = content.length > 30 ? java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", "KW8Dvm2N", "1ae2c94b").decryptStr(content) : `${java.getString("$..message")}\n登录后请更新目录，刷新正文`; result = intro + vipc + say; } else { result = intro + content + say; } } else { result = ""; } // 评论处理 if (/评论\d+/.test(bbb) || /评论\d+/.test(sss)) { const commentNum = (/评论(\d+)/.exec(bbb) || /评论(\d+)/.exec(sss))[1]; const commentUrl = baseUrl.replace(/androidapi/, 'comment').replace(/chapterContent/, 'getCommentList') + `&limit=${commentNum}&offset=0`; const comment = JSON.parse(java.ajax(commentUrl)); const cflag = comment.code === "200" || comment.code === undefined; let commentb = ''; if (cflag) { const commentList = comment.commentList || comment.data?.commentList || []; commentb = commentList.map(b => `@${b.commentAuthor} 🕘${b.commentDate}\n${b.commentBody}\n‎\n`).join(''); } else { commentb = comment.message; } result += `\nㅤ\n最新评论：\n${commentb.replace(/<br>/g, '\n')}`; } result; }catch(e){} ##为营造更好的评论环境，近期网站要求发评须进行实名认证，未实名用户评论暂时仅在对应作者后台及发评用户后台可见.*|获取正文失败[\s\S]+|◎\s+?◎|◎undefined◎

	chapter2=result.match(/◎[\s\S]+?◎([\s\S]+)/)[1].replace(/\s/g,'').replace(/,/g,'，');

	//前4个字相同就删除

	if(chapter.substring(0,num)==chapter2.substring(0,num)){

	}else{result}

function removeDuplicatedParagraphs(text, chapterTitle) {
    var paragraphs = text.split('\n');
    var firstParagraph = paragraphs[0].trim();
    var containsSpecialChar = firstParagraph.includes('◎');
    var targetIndex = containsSpecialChar ? 1 : 0;
    var targetParagraph = paragraphs[targetIndex].trim();
    var lastChar = targetParagraph.charAt(targetParagraph.length - 1);
    var isPunctuation = /[——◎。！？，；：、\.\?!,;:》 】）”’…~"'\)]/.test(lastChar);
    
    if (!isPunctuation) {
        for (var char of chapterTitle) {
            if (targetParagraph.includes(char)) {
                if (char === ' ' || char === '☪') continue;
                java.log("删除当前段落："+targetParagraph)
                java.log("当前章节名："+chapterTitle)
                java.log("相同文字："+char)
                paragraphs.splice(targetIndex, 1);
                break;
            }
        }
    }
    return paragraphs.join('\n');
}

let bbb = String(book.getVariable("custom"));
let sss = String(source.getVariable());

//净化第一段章节名

result

variableComment:
❗️缓存过的东西都是需要刷新才生效【正文，目录】

1、书籍变量（当前书）
填写[章节名]  ——  变为第xx章 章节名

填写 [去章节序号] —— 去除章节序号 

填写 [目录简介【符号】] —— 章节简介放到目录列表，正文不出现
符号：跟章节名连接时中间的符号，如 目录简介【 】，中间将为空格

填写[目录简介【删除】]——删除正文章节简介【需要更新目录后刷新正文】

填写[关闭作话]——删除作话

填写[净化] —— 这个是用来删除正文第一段是章节名的，可能会误伤。

填写 [评论+评论数量]——如 评论50  则正文显示50条评论，数量必填

填写 [开启购买/关闭购买]  —— 如 开启购买 则会开启自动购买下五章【确认以后点右上角三点刷新才会生效，使用完毕后最好删除，避免重复请求】


2、源变量（所有书）
同书籍变量

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
if(result.match(/百度安全验证/)){
	xb=(baseUrl)+","+JSON.stringify({
		"headers":{
			"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86 64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/127.0.0.0 Safari/537.36"
}})
java.startBrowserAwait(xb,"验证")
result=java.ajax(xb)
	}

var bookList = [];
var finalJsonOutput = null;
try {
    var doc = result;
    if (!doc) {
        throw new Error("无法解析 HTML");
    }
    var containers = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(doc).select("div.c-container.result-op, div.c-container.result");
    java.log("找到 " + containers.size() + " 个");
    for (var i = 0; i < containers.size(); i++) {
        var container = containers.get(i);
        var book = {};
        if (container.hasClass("result-op")) {            
            java.log("处理第 " + (i + 1) + " 个 (result-op)");            
            book.bookUrl = container.attr("mu") || null;             
            var nameElement = container.selectFirst("a");
            if (nameElement) {
                var nameText = nameElement.text().trim();
                book.name = (nameText) ? nameText : "未找到";
                if (!nameText) {
                    //java.log("未找到书名，a 标签内容: " + nameElement.outerHtml());
                }
            } else {
                book.name = "未找到";
                //java.log("未找到书名对应的 a 标签");
            }            
            var authorElement = container.selectFirst("span");
            if (authorElement) {
                var authorText = authorElement.text().trim();
                var prefix = "作者： "; 
                if (authorText.includes(prefix)) {
                    book.author = authorText.substring(prefix.length).trim();
                } else {
                    book.author = "未找到";
                    //java.log("作者信息未找到或格式不符: " + authorElement.outerHtml());
                }
            } else {
                book.author = "未找到";
                //java.log("未找到作者对应的 span 标签");
            }            
            var introElement = container.selectFirst("div.text_2NOr6");
            var introText = null;
            if (introElement) {
                introText = introElement.text().trim();
                book.intro = introText;                 
                book.kind = null; 
                if (!introText.startsWith("简介:")) {
                    var kindPrefix = "类别:";
                    var kindIndex = introText.indexOf(kindPrefix);
                    if (kindIndex !== -1) {
                        var kindTemp = introText.substring(kindIndex + kindPrefix.length).trim();
                        var chapterPrefix = "最新章节"; 
                        var chapterIndex = kindTemp.indexOf(chapterPrefix);
                        if (chapterIndex !== -1) {
                            book.kind = kindTemp.substring(0, chapterIndex).trim(); 
                        } else {
                            book.kind = kindTemp; 
                        }
                    } else {
                        //java.log("未在 intro 文本中找到 '类别:' 用于提取 kind: " + introText);
                    }
                } else {
                    //java.log("intro 文本以 '简介:' 开头，kind 设为 null");
                }
            } else {
                book.intro = null; 
                book.kind = null;
                //java.log("未找到 intro/kind 对应的 div.text_2NOr6 标签");
            }            
            var allAElements = container.select("a");
            if (allAElements.size() >= 2) {
                book.lastChapter = allAElements.get(allAElements.size() - 2).text().trim();
            } else {
                book.lastChapter = null; 
                //java.log("a 标签数量不足，无法提取倒数第二个作为 lastChapter");
            }
        } else if (container.hasClass("result")) {            
            java.log("处理第 " + (i + 1) + " (result)");            
            book.bookUrl = container.attr("mu") || null;            
            var nameElement = container.selectFirst("a");
            if (nameElement) {
                var nameText = nameElement.text().trim();
                book.name = (nameText) ? nameText : "未找到";
                if (!nameText) {
                   //java.log("未找到书名，a 标签内容: " + nameElement.outerHtml());
                }
            } else {
                book.name = "未找到";
                //java.log("未找到书名对应的 a 标签");
            }            
            var contentRightElement = container.selectFirst(".content-right_1THTn");
            if (contentRightElement) {
                var fullText = contentRightElement.text().trim();
                book.intro = fullText;                 
                book.author = null; 
                var authorPrefix = "作者:"; 
                var authorIndex = fullText.indexOf(authorPrefix);
                var kindSeparator = "类别"; 
                var kindIndexForAuthor = fullText.indexOf(kindSeparator);
                if (authorIndex !== -1) { 
                    var startIndex = authorIndex + authorPrefix.length;
                    var endIndex = (kindIndexForAuthor !== -1 && kindIndexForAuthor > authorIndex) ? kindIndexForAuthor : fullText.length;
                    book.author = fullText.substring(startIndex, endIndex).trim();
                } else {
                    //java.log("未在 .content-right_1THTn 中找到 '作者:'");
                }                
                book.kind = null; 
                var kindPrefix = "类别:"; 
                var kindIndex = fullText.indexOf(kindPrefix);
                var chapterSeparator = "最新章节"; 
                var chapterIndexForKind = fullText.indexOf(chapterSeparator);
                if (kindIndex !== -1) { 
                    var startIndex = kindIndex + kindPrefix.length;
                    var endIndex = (chapterIndexForKind !== -1 && chapterIndexForKind > kindIndex) ? chapterIndexForKind : fullText.length;
                    book.kind = fullText.substring(startIndex, endIndex).trim();
                } else {
                    //java.log("未在 .content-right_1THTn 中找到 '类别:'");
                }                
                book.lastChapter = null; 
                var chapterPrefix = "最新章节:"; 
                var chapterIndex = fullText.indexOf(chapterPrefix);
                var updateSeparator = "最新更新"; 
                var updateIndex = fullText.indexOf(updateSeparator);

                if (chapterIndex !== -1) { 
                    var startIndex = chapterIndex + chapterPrefix.length;
                    var endIndex = (updateIndex !== -1 && updateIndex > chapterIndex) ? updateIndex : fullText.length;
                    book.lastChapter = fullText.substring(startIndex, endIndex).trim();
                } else {
                    //java.log("未在 .content-right_1THTn 中找到 '最新章节:'");
                }
            } else {                
                book.author = null;
                book.kind = null;
                book.lastChapter = null;
                book.intro = null;
                //java.log("未找到 .content-right_1THTn 元素");
            }
        } else {
            //java.log("跳过未知类型的容器: " + container.outerHtml().substring(0, 100));
            continue; 
        }        
        bookList.push(book);
    }
    var finalResult = {
        bookList: bookList 
    };
    finalJsonOutput = JSON.stringify(finalResult);
} catch (e) {
    java.log("错误: " + e);
    finalJsonOutput = JSON.stringify({
        bookList: []
    }); 
}
result = finalJsonOutput;
</js>

function getUrl(_) {
  const { java, source } =_|| this
  let v = String(source.getVariable())
  if(v.length < 1){
    source.setVariable("0")
    v = v.match(/^\d+$/) ? v : 0
  }
  return urls[v]
}

	return i

	if(!nm&&cos==1) nm=rr.match(/(^.+)\s+[–\-]\s+(.+$)/);
	if (nm&&!/^3d$/i.test(nm[1])) {java.put('anm',nm[1]); result=nm[2];}
	else {java.put('anm',rr); result=rr;}
	}
else {java.put('anm','合集'); result='📚'+hj;}

result
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
v = String(source.getVariable()).split(",");
x=v[2]
 if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){
name=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@tag.h1.0@text}}`
author=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.1@a@text}}`
kind=`{{book.kind}}`
word=`{{book.wordCount}}`
last=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.0@text##最新：}}`

try {
    const response = java.ajax(`{{getUrl()}}api/novel/app/novel/comments?novelId=@get:{bid}&sortType=1&page=${x}&rows=5`);
    const jsonData = JSON.parse(response);
    const logOutput = jsonData.data.map(comment => {
        const cleanNickName = comment.updateTime.replace(/T/g,'  ').replace(/\..*/g, '');
        // 根据分数生成星星显示
        const generateStars = (score) => {
            let starCount = Math.min(Math.floor(score / 2), 5);
            let stars = '';
            for (let i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
                stars += i < starCount? '★' : '☆';
            }
            return stars;
        };
        const starDisplay = generateStars(comment.score);
        return `
  [${cleanNickName}]  ${comment.createTimeFormat}
⛄【${comment.nickName}】:👍🏻${comment.score} ${starDisplay}
 ${comment.content}
 \n­
 
`;
    }).join('\n');
    //java.log(logOutput);
} catch (error) {
    const errorLog = {
        [SyntaxError.name]: '数据解析失败: ',
        default: 'AJAX请求失败: '
    }[error.name || 'default'] + error.message;
    java.log(errorLog);
}
info = ` 
📖 书名：{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@tag.h1.0@text}}
👤 作者：{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.1@a@text}}

🕰 最新：{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.0@text##最新：}}
👁 观看：{{@@class.props_box@ul@li.2@text}}
❤️ 收藏：{{@@class.props_box@ul@li.3@text}}
🏷 简介：{{@@class.ellipsis@text##小说简介：}}`;
intro=info+`\n­\n【✨评论✨】最新\n­${logOutput}`
info=logOutput?intro:info
}else if(baseUrl.match(/comic/)){
	name=`{{book.name}}`
		author=`{{book.author}}`
		kind=`{{book.kind}}`
		word=``
		last=``
		info=` 
📖 书名：{{book.name}}
👤 作者：{{book.author}}
🏷 简介：{{book.intro}}`;

	}else if (baseUrl.match(/video/)) {
		name=`{{$.model.title}}`

		last=``

		}else if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) {
   name=`{{$.model.title}}`

		kind=`{{java.getString('.finished')==1?"完结":"连载"}},{{$..categories}}`
		word=``

}
data = {

};

JSON.stringify(data);

        vol: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false,

}

<js>
 v = String(source.getVariable()).split(",");
 x = v[0];
let url = `${getUrl()}`;
let uri="data:;base64,辞晨,{'type':''}";
try {
	if (x == 0){
	url +=	`api/novel/app/novel/search?category=&excludeTags=&keyword=${key}&orderType=0&page=${page}&searchType=1&size=40`
	ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
				}else if (x == 1) {
url +=	`api/comic/app/comic/search?keyword=${key}&orderType=1&page=${page}&searchType=1&size=40`
ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
     }else if (x == 2 ) {
url +=	`api/video/app/video/search?keyword=${key}&orderType=1&page=${page}&searchType=1&size=40`
ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
	   	}else if (x == 3 ) {
url +=	`api/audio/app/audio/search?category=&keyword={{encodeURIComponent(key)}}&orderType=0&page=${page}&searchType=1&size=42`
ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
}
let code = ss.statusCode();
if (code==302||code==301) {
	uri=ss.header("location");
	}
	else if (code == 200) {
	cache.put('urlss', ss.body());
		}else if (code == 502) {
		java.toast('\n'+'👻ip被拉黑了👻')
}
	}catch(err) {
		java.log('💔访问出错💔')
		java.toast('\n💔访问出错，请换接口💔')
	}
	uri;
</js>

By小新

视频每天好像只能看10次，需要开vip才能一直看
搜索规则：
一共有视频，图片，漫画，小说四个选项，除小说外想搜什么选项就在要搜的内容后面加上@选项，小说不用加
例：
想搜索视频内容《台北娜娜》就在搜索框输入"台北娜娜@视频"
想搜索小说《逆天邪神》就直接在搜索框输入"逆天邪神"就行

ruleContent.content:
<js>
let result=result;
let content1;

var na=source.bookSourceComment;

var ra=java.base64Decode('QnnlsI/mlrAK6aaW5Y+R6K665Z2bOmh0dHBzOi8vc3JjYmJzLmNvbS8=');

if(na.includes(ra)){
   
//小说
if (baseUrl['match'](/pid=1/)){
	 content1=java['getString']('html@body@script@html');
	 var urlMatch = result.match(/url:\s*'([^']+)'/g)[1];
if (urlMatch && urlMatch.length > 1) {
    var ajaxUrl = urlMatch.match(/url:'(.*)'/)[1];
    }
    g = url =>java.ajax(url);
    let content = java.getString("p@text",g(ajaxUrl));
content;
	}
	
			//图片
	else if(baseUrl['match'](/pid=2/)){
	 content1=java['getString']('body>[class="container"]@img@html');
	 }
	
				//漫画
	else if(baseUrl['match'](/pid=3/)){
	 content1=java['getString']('body>[class="container"]@img@html');
	 }
	
	//视频
	else if(baseUrl['match'](/pid=0/)){
let pic=java.get('pic');	content1=java['getString']('body@script.-1@all');
let url=content1.match(/url: "(.*)",/)[1];
if(url){
	java.startBrowser(url,chapter.title)
java.toast('正在加载视频\n视频加载较慢，请耐心等待')
' 【刷新正文】或【点击章节链接】跳转播放\n不要相信且不要点击视频里的任何广告，🔗直链:\n'+url+pic
	}
else{
	'本站每日限量观看10部视频，您今日的次数已用完，您可以分享继续观看或者12小時候後播放次数恢复再看，也可以登录VIP专线继续观看。'+pic
	}
	}
   
   
   
   }
else{	java.base64Decode('6K+35LiN6KaB5L+u5pS55L2c6ICFLOivt+S4jeimgeebl+a6kA==');
	}



</js>

else if(key.match(/@图片/))
{
result='https://www.europeli.com/search?pid=2&keyword={{key.split("@")[0]}}&page={{page}}';
}

else if(key.match(/@漫画/))
{
result='https://www.europeli.com/search?pid=3&keyword={{key.split("@")[0]}}&page={{page}}';
}

else 
{
result='https://www.europeli.com/search?pid=1&keyword={{key}}&page={{page}}';
}


result
</js>
@js:result+",{\"webView\": true}"
